scripts.start:gauzy: cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn run config:dev && yarn ng serve gauzy
scripts.start:gauzy:pm2: cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn run build && yarn ts-node ./apps/gauzy/src/pm2bootstrap.ts
scripts.start:gauzy:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn run config:prod && yarn ng serve gauzy --disable-host-check --host 0.0.0.0 -c=production --prod
scripts.start:api: cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn ng serve api
scripts.start:api:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn ng serve api --host 0.0.0.0 -c=production --prod
scripts.start:api:ci: cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=7000 yarn --frozen-lockfile --cache-folder ~/.cache/yarn ng:ci serve api -c=production --prod
scripts.start:api:pm2: cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn run build:api && yarn ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register --project apps/api/tsconfig.app.json ./apps/api/src/pm2bootstrap.ts
scripts.seed: cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=7000 yarn run config:dev && yarn ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register --project apps/api/tsconfig.app.json ./apps/api/src/seed.ts
scripts.seed:all: cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=7000 yarn run config:dev && yarn ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register --project apps/api/tsconfig.app.json ./apps/api/src/seed-all.ts
scripts.seed:jobs: cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=7000 yarn run config:dev && yarn ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register --project apps/api/tsconfig.app.json ./apps/api/src/seed-jobs.ts
scripts.seed:module: cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=7000 yarn run config:dev && yarn ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register --project apps/api/tsconfig.app.json ./apps/api/src/seed-module.ts --name
scripts.seed:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=7000 yarn run config:prod && yarn ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register --project apps/api/tsconfig.app.json ./apps/api/src/seed.ts
scripts.build: npm run postinstall.web && cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn run config:dev && yarn ng build gauzy
scripts.build:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn run config:prod && yarn ng build gauzy -c=production --prod
scripts.build:prod:ci: cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=7000 yarn run config:prod && yarn --frozen-lockfile --cache-folder ~/.cache/yarn ng:ci build gauzy -c=production --prod
scripts.build:api: cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn ng build api
scripts.build:api:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn ng build api -c=production --prod
scripts.bundle-report: cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn run config:prod && yarn ng build -c=production --stats-json && webpack-bundle-analyzer dist/apps/gauzy/stats.json
scripts.test: npm run postinstall.web && cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn run config:dev && yarn ng test
scripts.lint: cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn run config:dev && yarn nx lint && yarn ng lint
scripts.e2e: npm run postinstall.web && cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn run config:dev && yarn ng e2e
scripts.e2e:ci: npm run postinstall.web && cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=7000 yarn run config:prod && yarn --frozen-lockfile --cache-folder ~/.cache/yarn ng:ci e2e -c=production --prod --headless
scripts.build:desktop: cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn run config:prod && npm run prepare:desktop && ng build desktop --prod --base-href ./ && ng build desktop-api --prod && ng build api-desktop --prod && npm run build:desktop:ui
scripts.build:desktop:local: cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn run config:prod && npm run build:desktop && electron dist/apps/desktop
scripts.build:desktop:linux: cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn run config:prod && npm run build:desktop && cd dist/apps/desktop && npx electron-builder@22.9.1 -c.electronVersion=10.1.3 build --linux
scripts.build:desktop:windows: cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn run config:prod && npm run build:desktop && cd dist/apps/desktop && npx electron-builder@22.9.1 -c.electronVersion=10.1.3 build --windows
scripts.build:desktop:mac: npm run build:desktop && cd dist/apps/desktop && npx electron-builder@22.9.1 -c.electronVersion=10.1.3 build --mac
scripts.build:desktop:linux:release: cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn run config:prod && npm run build:desktop && cd dist/apps/desktop && npx electron-builder@22.9.1 -c.electronVersion=10.1.3 build --linux --publish=always
scripts.build:desktop:windows:release: cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn run config:prod && npm run build:desktop && cd dist/apps/desktop && npx electron-builder@22.9.1 -c.electronVersion=10.1.3 build --windows --publish=always
scripts.build:desktop:mac:release: npm run build:desktop && cd dist/apps/desktop && npx electron-builder@22.9.1 -c.electronVersion=10.1.3 build --mac --publish=always
scripts.start:desktop: npm run prepare:desktop && npm-run-all -p serve.electron.gauzy-desktop.target serve.electron.gauzy-desktop
scripts.start.gauzy: npm run postinstall.web && nx serve gauzy
scripts.build:sqlite:windows: cd node_modules/sqlite3 && cross-env HOME=~/.electron-gyp node-pre-gyp rebuild --target=8.3.0 --arch=x64 --target_platform=win32 --dist-url=https://electronjs.org/headers
scripts.start:desktop:ui: npm run postinstall.web && cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 && yarn ng serve desktop-ui
scripts.build:desktop:ui: cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 && ng build desktop-ui --prod --base-href
scripts.start:api:desktop: cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn ng serve api-desktop
scripts.deploy:desktop:mac: cd dist/apps/desktop && npx electron-builder@22.9.1 -c.electronVersion=10.1.3 build --mac --publish always
